## Professional Profile

Hello! I'm Vidhi, a passionate analytics student currently pursuing my Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. With a background in Computer Science and professional experience as a Business Analyst, I'm developing advanced skills to tackle complex problems through technology and analytics.

My journey in data started during my undergraduate studies, where I discovered the power of transforming raw data into meaningful insights. Since then, I've been on a mission to leverage data-driven approaches to solve real-world challenges and enable better business decisions.

## My Approach

I believe that effective analytics is not just about technical skills but also about understanding the business context and communicating insights clearly. My approach combines:

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .card .p-3 .mb-3}
### Data-Driven Methodology
- Begin with clearly defined business questions
- Collect and clean relevant data
- Apply appropriate analytical techniques
- Validate findings and test hypotheses
- Translate results into business recommendations
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .card .p-3 .mb-3}
### Collaborative Mindset
- Partner with stakeholders to understand needs
- Communicate complex findings in accessible terms
- Work cross-functionally to implement solutions
- Continuously learn and adapt to new challenges
- Share knowledge and mentor colleagues
:::

:::
